name: Miele & Cie. KG
goal: Development, production and marketing of electrical household products and related appliances for the use in professional and medical environment and the digital Services combined with these products.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
